mapper.select: select round(((COUNT(CASE WHEN championName_KR = #{championName_KR} THEN 1 END)/5 / (COUNT(*)/10))* 100),2) AS pick_percentage FROM zzz_datas_rune where teamPosition = #{teamPosition}

SELECT value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10, value11, value12, value13, value14, value15, value16, COUNT(*) AS skill_count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition})*100, 2) as skill_percentage FROM ( SELECT JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[0]') AS value1, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[1]') AS value2, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[2]') AS value3, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[3]') AS value4, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[4]') AS value5, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[5]') AS value6, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[6]') AS value7, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[7]') AS value8, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[8]') AS value9, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[9]') AS value10, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[10]') AS value11, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[11]') AS value12, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[12]') AS value13, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[13]') AS value14, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[14]') AS value15, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[15]') AS value16 FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and championName_KR = #{championName_KR} ) AS subquery GROUP BY value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10, value11, value12, value13, value14, value15, value16 ORDER BY skill_count DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT core1, core2, core3, COUNT(*) AS item_count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_item WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1})*100, 2) as item_percentage, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS item_win_percentage FROM zzz_datas_item WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1} and core2 != 0 and core3 != 0 GROUP BY core1 ORDER BY item_count DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT shoes, COUNT(*) AS shoes_count, round((count(*))/(select count(*) from zzz_datas_item where championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and shoes != 0 and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1})*100, 2) as shoes_pickRate, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS shoes_win_percentage FROM zzz_datas_item WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and shoes != 0 and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1} GROUP BY shoes ORDER BY shoes_count DESC limit 1;

SELECT main_name, main_perks1, main_perks2, main_perks3, main_perks4, sub_name, sub_perks1, sub_perks2, stat_perks1, stat_perks2, stat_perks3, COUNT(*) AS rune_count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR})*100, 2) as rune_percentage, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS rune_win_percentage FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1} GROUP BY main_name, sub_name ORDER BY rune_count DESC LIMIT 1;
